raw_comment: One thing I noticed is that in the graphs there is more colored people with athletes. They were the red and had very high percentages. I thing I wondered is why soccer has the most color coaches. I don’t think it impacts or changes my perspective on things because I don’t see the color of someone’s skin a difference from all of us. I don’t think it impacts our community except for the people who think differently and have there opinions for people of color. So I don’t think it makes a big impact at all on my life or anyone’s.
ace_sentences: I noticed something in the graphs.
In the graphs, more athletes are people of color.
In the graphs, the red color represents people of color.
The red group has very high percentages.
I wonder why soccer has the most coaches of color.
This does not change my perspective.
I do not see the skin color of a person as a difference.
This does not impact our community.
Some people think differently about people of color.
Some people have opinions about people of color.
This does not make a big impact on my life.
This does not make a big impact on anyone's life.
